title: [NFC][Clang] Simplify getTrailingObjects for OpenACC/OpenMP Clause
body: Simplify usage of `getTrailingObjects` for OpenACC/OpenMP Clause by using either the non-templated form for single trailing types or using the single argument form that returns an ArrayRef/MutableArrayRef.
commits:
[NFC][Clang] Simplify getTrailingObjects for OpenACC/OpenMP Clause

Simplify usage of `getTrailingObjects` for OpenACC/OpenMP Clause
by using either the non-templated form for single trailing types
or using the single argument form that returns an
ArrayRef/MutableArrayRef.
